headlines.description: Jamie Vardy came off the bench to take a penalty which was saved as Tottenham beat Leicester 3-1 to close gap to leaders Liverpool to five points.
headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs beat Leicester as Vardy misses penalty

headlines.description: Manchester City moved back to the top of the Premier League after embarrassing a stunned Chelsea 6-0 at the Etihad on Sunday.

video.headline: Raheem Sterling's 2nd goal is Man City's 6th

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC ONE PLAY (Raheem Sterling's 2nd goal is Man City's 6th) 2019/2/10 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Aguero scores 3, City beat Chelsea 6-0 to go top
